d565302f-2913-473b-8a3f-2e8098496377.text: The main component is the Dosa, which is a pancake from the Indian subcontinent, made from a fermented batter. Its main ingredients are rice and black gram! That is filled with a curried potato which contains mustard seeds among other delicious spices!
